*cyrus walks up to tj and leans against the wall*
Cyrus: Heyyyyy...Teeejaayyy
TJ: Hey Cy what's up 
Cyrus: I heard you like bad...
body:
*cyrus walks up to tj and leans against the wall*

Cyrus: Heyyyyy…Teeejaayyy

TJ: Hey Cy what’s up

Cyrus: I heard you like bad boys

TJ: I- uhhh

Cyrus: Well you’re in luck because I was arrested yesterday

TJ: You’re really bad at flirting aren’t you

Cyrus: I’m really trying just let me have this one

summary: Is it true that 314 is airing on the 7th in the UK
question: Is it true that 314 is airing on the 7th in the UK
answer:
As far as I can tell - no. There was a promo that leaked for 314 that said it would be airing this Friday on Disney Channel UK, however all signs point to that being an accident. All of the TV listings for Disney Channel UK currently say that episode 312 will be airing on the 7th, which would make sense. I imagine that Disney Channel UK will air 312 on the 7th, 313 on the 14th, and then be caught up in time to air 314 on the 21st. The promo that was officially released today by Disney Channel UK seems to support this, considering it teases the Miranda/Bex storyline and the Jamber kiss from 312 as things that are “coming up” in season 3.

I don’t live in the UK or keep up with their air schedule most of the time. I think I saw some people say that these episodes already aired in the UK - but neither of them are in the current lineup of reruns so I’m not sure. If anyone in the UK has more insight, feel free to let me know. But as far as I can tell - there’s no reason to assume they’ll be getting the new episodes earlier than the US.

summary: Atomic Shadow and the Titanium Vengeance - Chapter 3 - captainkippen - Andi Mack (TV) [Archive of Our Own]
title: Atomic Shadow and the Titanium Vengeance - Chapter 3 - captainkippen - Andi Mack (TV) [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 3/22
Fandom: Andi Mack (TV)
Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
Relationships: Cyrus Goodman/T. J. Kippen
Characters: Cyrus Goodman, T.J. Kippen, Andi Mack, Buffy Driscoll, Dr. Metcalf (Andi Mack), Rose (Andi Mack), Original Characters
Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - Superheroes/Superpowers, Alternate Universe - High School, Aged-Up Character(s), Minor Character Death, Fake Science, Slow Burn, Minor Violence
Summary:

Cyrus Goodman just wants to get through high school in one piece, but that’s a lot easier said than done when the universe seems to have other plans.

After moving to New York to attend a state of the art science academy, Cyrus finds himself entangled in a world of violence, superpowers and dangerous plots. In the middle of it all is T.J. Kippen, an angry young inventor, and Cyrus soon finds himself falling harder than he ever has before.

Tag list: @tj-looked-back-kippen || @ohschnappz || @criminalambis || @admirablyamber || @thedampjofangirl || @nightmaretarts || @buh-bichie || @enchantingtyrus || @tozbier || @cap2dyke || @breadisticks || @likelightning-inabottle || @a-bittersweet-gal || @paytonotinthemood || @delicatesleeper || @clairecieux

summary: Here’s day 2 of @lgbtqa-pride-icons pride month art prompts! I received so much positivity from yesterday’s post and I wanted to...
body:
DAY 2- Draw a gay character

Here’s day 2 of @lgbtqa-pride-icons pride month art prompts! I received so much positivity from yesterday’s post and I wanted to thank you all for that! It made me really happy which was good since I didn’t have a spectacular day lol

For today’s prompt I decided to draw this important little bean, Cyrus Goodman, also known as the first person who ever got to say the words “I’m gay” on Disney Channel! Cyrus is a character on the show Andi Mack if you didn’t know and it’s such an important show with such important characters such as Cyrus who is as I said is the first character who got to identify as gay on Disney Channel, Jonah who has panic attacks, TJ who has a learning disability, Buffy who is a POC with a military mom, and Libby who is deaf. There’s just so much representation on this show and I’m so sad that this is going to be it’s last season but I’m hoping I will be satisfied with how they end things. Anyways thanks again for all the love and see you again for tomorrow’s prompt!

reblog.comment:
DAY 2- Draw a gay character

Here’s day 2 of @lgbtqa-pride-icons pride month art prompts! I received so much positivity from yesterday’s post and I wanted to thank you all for that! It made me really happy which was good since I didn’t have a spectacular day lol

For today’s prompt I decided to draw this important little bean, Cyrus Goodman, also known as the first person who ever got to say the words “I’m gay” on Disney Channel! Cyrus is a character on the show Andi Mack if you didn’t know and it’s such an important show with such important characters such as Cyrus who is as I said is the first character who got to identify as gay on Disney Channel, Jonah who has panic attacks, TJ who has a learning disability, Buffy who is a POC with a military mom, and Libby who is deaf. There’s just so much representation on this show and I’m so sad that this is going to be it’s last season but I’m hoping I will be satisfied with how they end things. Anyways thanks again for all the love and see you again for tomorrow’s prompt!
